feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2024-01-31T12:08:55.056544Z; ; ; <作者>; <名称>;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;XFaaS：Meta 的超大规模和低成本无服务器功能</stitle>; <id>;https://www.micahlerner.com/2024/01/23/xfaas-hyperscale-and- low-cost-serverless-functions-at-meta.html</id>; <更新>;2024-01-31T06:08:44.988411Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.micahlerner.com/2024 /01/23/xfaas-hyperscale-and-low-cost-serverless-functions-at-meta.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;greghn</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com /user?id=greghn</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.micahlerner.com/assets/xfaas/figure3.png" style="width: 220 像素；高度：114 像素；" />;<br />;功能即服务系统 (FaaS) 允许工程师运行代码，而无需为特定功能预留服务器。本文描述了 Meta 的无服务器内部系统，称为 XFaaS，该系统每天在超过 100,000 台服务器上运行数万亿次函数调用。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#xfaas-hyperscale-and-low-cost-serverless-functions-at-meta" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39200239" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;构建 USB 到 Mac ADB 键盘适配器</stitle>; <id>;https://paperstack.com/adb_usb_converter/</id>; <updated >;2024-01-31T07:08:44.990754Z</updated>; <link href="https://paperstack.com/adb_usb_converter/"/>; <author>; <name>;dcminter</name>; <uri>;https:// /news.ycombinator.com/user?id=dcminter</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://paperstack.com/img/adb_usb/keyboard.jpg" 样式=“宽度：220像素；高度：104像素；” />;<br />;大约一年前，作者开始了一份在 Mac 上工作的新工作，但他们并不特别喜欢。他们决定使用 QMK 项目构建 USB 到 Mac ADB 键盘适配器。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#building-a-usb-to-mac-adb-keyboard-adapter" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39188954" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：ChatGPT 提示生成器 - 最简单的提示生成器</stitle>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text ">;英特尔的谦卑</stitle>; <id>;https://stratechery.com/2024/intels-humbling/</id>; <updated>;2024-01-31T00:08:44.991594Z</updated>; <link href= "https://stratechery.com/2024/intels-humbling/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;jseliger</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jseliger</uri >; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i0.wp.com/stratechery.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/01/intel-humbling-1.png?调整大小=640%2C331&ssl=1" style="width: 220px; height: 114px;" />;<br />;英特尔现任首席执行官帕特·基辛格 (Pat Gelsinger) 面临着挑战，因为该公司正在努力应对令人失望的预测和来自 AMD 的竞争。基辛格正在努力将英特尔转型为一家服务外部客户并重新获得工艺领先地位的代工厂及其 18A 流程。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#intel-s-humbling" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news .ycombinator.com/item?id=39197619" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed .xml">; <title type="text">;为什么自定义 GPT 比插件更好</stitle>; <id>;https://moveit.substack.com/p/why-custom-gpts-are-better-than-插件</id>; <更新>;2024-01-31T05:08:44.991972Z</更新>; <link href="https://moveit.substack.com/p/why-custom-gpts-are-better-than -plugins"/>; <作者>; <名称>;cheerioty</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=cheerioty</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#why-custom-gpts-are-better-than-plugins" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#epitaph-fermi-paradox-simulator" 目标="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39200182" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;平方公里阵列原型“范围实现第一束光</stitle>; <id>; https://www.theregister.com/2024/01/30/ska_skampi_first_light/</id>; <更新>;2024-01-31T05:08:44.993070Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.theregister.com/2024/01/30/ska_skampi_first_light/</id>; theregister.com/2024/01/30/ska_skampi_first_light/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;除霜</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=defrost</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://regmedia.co.uk/2024/01/30/supplied_ska_skampi_first_light.jpg?x=648&y=324&infer_y=1" style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;用于平方公里阵列的射电望远镜设计之一，称为SKAMPI，已经实现了第一束光。该望远镜由来自十个国家的团队设计，在中国建造。测试已进行在南非，该望远镜展示了其光谱和脉冲星能力。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#square-kilometre-array-prototype-scope-achieves-first-light" target="_blank ">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39188125" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry >; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;为什么飞虫会在人造光下聚集</stitle>; <id>;https://www .nature.com/articles/s41467-024-44785-3</id>; <更新>;2024-01-30T19:08:44.993435Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.nature.com/ articles/s41467-024-44785-3"/>; <author>; <name>;pseudolus</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pseudolus</uri>; </author>; <内容类型=“html”>; <img src =“https://media.springernature.com/lw685/springer-static/image/art%3A10.1038%2Fs41467-024-44785-3/MediaObjects/41467_2024_44785_Fig1_HTML.png”样式=“宽度：220px； height: 151px;" />;<br />;夜间活动的昆虫不会直接转向人造光，而是将它们的背部转向光线，产生垂直于光源的飞行。这种背部倾斜是解释为什么飞行昆虫最合理的模型在人造光处聚集。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#why-flying-insects-gather-at-artificial-light" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39192807" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// /hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Gitlab 的 ActivityPub 架构蓝图</stitle>; <id>;https://docs.gitlab.com/ee/architecture/blueprints/activity_pub/< /id>; <更新>;2024-01-31T09:08:44.993795Z</更新>; <link href="https://docs.gitlab.com/ee/architecture/blueprints/activity_pub/"/>; <作者>; < name>;p4bl0</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=p4bl0</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;该提案的最终目标是构建使用 ActivityPub 将互操作功能引入 GitLab。这将允许跨实例合并请求和社交功能，使 GitLab 更具社交性并扩大其受众。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#gitlab-s-activitypub-architecture-blueprint" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=39201453" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;Microsoft Edge 忽略用户意愿，未经许可从 Chrome 中获取标签</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theregister.com/2024/01/30/microsoft_edge_tabs/</ id>; <更新>;2024-01-31T09:08:44.994162Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.theregister.com/2024/01/30/microsoft_edge_tabs/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;fauigerzigerk</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=fauigerzigerk</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://regmedia .co.uk/2024/01/30/shutterstock_edge_chrome.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：110px；" />;<br />;微软的 Edge 浏览器在未经许可的情况下导入打开的 Chrome 标签页和其他数据，即使该功能已被禁用。这种情况至少从 2022 年中期就开始发生，并引起了用户的隐私担忧。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#microsoft-edge-ignores-user-wishes-slurps-tabs-from-chrome-without-permission" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39201317" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;支票兑现业务</stitle>; <id>;https://www.bitsaboutmoney.com/archive/the-business -of-check-cashing/</id>; <更新>;2024-01-30T23:08:44.994535Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.bitsaboutmoney.com/archive/the-business-of -check-cashing/"/>; <author>; <name>;admp</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=admp</uri>; </author>; <content type=" html">;<img src="https://www.bitsaboutmoney.com/content/images/size/w2000/2024/01/dalle-does-check-cashing.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px ;” />;<br />;本文讨论了支票兑现的过程以及围绕它的另类金融世界。它解释了支票兑现业务如何满足没有银行账户或银行服务不足的个人的需求，并强调了兑现支票所涉及的信用风险。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-business-of-check-cashing" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=39197116" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;Dynamouse：适用于 Mac 工作室的鼠标驱动程序</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/projectstorm/dynamouse</id>; <更新>;2024-01-31T02:08 ：44.994937Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/projectstorm/dynamouse"/>; <作者>; <name>;kobieps</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/ user?id=kobieps</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/0095c145b062586aa69323bd271131a800c7f6c00525676316322bcf3dfc4cd9/projectstorm/dynamouse" style="width: 220px; height : 110 像素;" />;<br />;macOS 多鼠标 &复杂屏幕和外围工作站的多外部显示分配。 dynamouse,macOS 多鼠标 &,下载dynamouse的源码_GitHub_帮酷复杂屏幕和外围工作站的多外部显示分配。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#dynamouse-mouse-driver-for-mac-studios" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39189339" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;启动 HN：Univerbal (YC W23) – 与对话式 AI 导师一起学习语言</stitle>; <id>;https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id= 39188760</id>; <更新>;2024-01-30T12:08:44.995332Z</更新>; <link href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39188760"/>; <作者>; <名称>;Hadjimina</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Hadjimina</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Univerbal 是一款人工智能语言学习应用程序，提供对话式人工智能导师。它旨在通过提供负担得起且易于使用的解决方案来解决昂贵且耗时的辅导问题。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#launch-hn-univerbal-yc-w23-language-learning-with-a-conversational-ai-tutor" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39188760" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;百老汇窗口系统</stitle>; <id>;https://docs.gtk.org/gtk4/broadway。 html</id>; <更新>;2024-01-30T23:08:44.995704Z</更新>; <link href="https://docs.gtk.org/gtk4/broadway.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;thunderbong</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=thunderbong</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://docs .gtk.org/gtk4/gtk-logo.svg" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;GDK Broadway 后端支持使用 HTML5 和 Web 套接字在 Web 浏览器中显示 GTK 应用程序。要以这种方式运行应用程序，请首先运行 GTK 附带的 Broadway 服务器 gtk-broadwayd： 显示编号通过以下公式确定连接到 Broadway 应用程序时要使用的端口： <a href="https:/ /hackernews.betacat.io/#the-broadway-windowing-system" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39175112" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text" >;Apple Vision Pro 评论</stitle>; <id>;https://thomasmansencal.substack.com/p/the-apparent-simplicity-of-rgb-rendering</id>; <更新>;2024-01-31T04:08:44.996776Z</已更新>; <link href="https://thomasmansencal.substack.com/p/the-apparent-simplicity-of-rgb-rendering"/>; <作者>; <name>;kelsolaar</name>; <uri>;https:// /news.ycombinator.com/user?id=kelsolaar</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-apparent-simplicity- of-rgb-rendering" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39187757" target="_blank">;[评论]< /a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;五角大楼试图隐瞒它收买了美国人的事实' 没有授权的数据</stitle>; <id>;https://www.wired.com/story/pentagon-data-purchases-wyden-letter/</id>; <updated>;2024-01-31T10:08:44.997131 Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.wired.com/story/pentagon-data-purchases-wyden-letter/"/>; <作者>; <name>;RafelMri</name>; <uri>;https ://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=RafelMri</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://media.wired.com/photos/65b2db67795c1b0b2f34d23d/master /w_2560%2Cc_limit/nsa-sec-GettyImages-1247909746.jpg" style="宽度：220px;高度：147px;" />;<br />;美国官员极力隐瞒美国间谍机构和私营公司之间通过手机追踪美国人行踪的安排细节。从美国手机获取位置数据通常需要搜查令，但警方和情报机构通常会向公司支付数据费用，从而有效地规避法庭。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-pentagon-tried-to-hide-that-it-bought-americans-data -without-a-warrant" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39201660" target="_blank">;[评论] </a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Google 搜索从搜索结果中删除缓存链接</stitle>; <id>;https://www.seroundtable.com/google-search-drops-cache-link-from-search-results-36787.html</id>; <更新>;2024-01-31T01:08 :44.997504Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.seroundtable.com/google-search-drops-cache-link-from-search-results-36787.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>; croes</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=croes</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://s3. amazonaws.com/images.seroundtable.com/google-robot-library-archives-1706180501.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 126px;" />;<br />;经过几个月的测试，Google 似乎已经从搜索结果页面中删除了缓存链接。我不再在搜索结果片段中看到指向 Google 缓存的链接，但并不意味着您无法访问缓存，您可以。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#google-search-drops-cache-link-from-search-results" target="_blank" >;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39198329" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;研究发现，保持健康可以将前列腺癌风险降低 35%</stitle>; <id>; https://www.theguardian.com/society/2024/jan/30/getting-fitter-can-reduce-prostate-cancer-risk-by-35-study-finds</id>; <更新>;2024-01- 31T05:08:44.997861Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.theguardian.com/society/2024/jan/30/getting-fitter-can-reduce-prostate-cancer-risk-by-35 -study-finds"/>; <作者>; <名称>;sandebert</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=sandebert</uri>; </author>; <content type="html ">;<img src="https://i.guim.co.uk/img/media/51a43fb4bb2a2dbd3f70546a7f6feba809d1d2ae/0_200_3000_1800/master/3000.jpg?width=465&dpr=1&s=none" style="宽度：220px;身高：132px;" />;<br />;通过增强心肺健康，男性可将患前列腺癌的风险降低多达 35%。每年提高 3% 的健康水平可降低患前列腺癌的几率。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#getting-fitter-can-reduce-prostate-cancer-risk-by-35-study-finds" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39200173" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Microsoft Edge 现在会在更新后从 Google Chrome 窃取您的数据</stitle>; <id>;https://9to5google.com/2024/ 01/30/microsoft-edge-chrome-data-update-windows/</id>; <更新>;2024-01-31T08:08:44.998215Z</更新>; <link href="https://9to5google.com/ 2024/01/30/microsoft-edge-chrome-data-update-windows/"/>; <author>; <name>;doener</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=doener </uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://9to5google.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/02/google_chrome_microsoft_edge_1.jpg?quality=82&strip =all&w=1600" style="宽度：220px; height: 111px;" />;<br />;即使未经用户同意，Microsoft Edge 也会在 Windows 更新后自动从 Chrome 复制所有活动选项卡，从而积极窃取 Google Chrome 中打开的选项卡。此行为是通过导入数据的设置启用的每次启动浏览器时从 Chrome 到 Edge，Windows 更新后默认启用该功能。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#microsoft-edge-now-steals-your-data-from-google -chrome-after-an-update" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39201224" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：开源x64 和 Arm GitHub 运行程序</stitle>; <id>;https://www.ubicloud.com/use-cases/github-actions</id>; <updated>;2024-01-30T17:08:44.998566Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.ubicloud.com/use-cases/github-actions"/>; <作者>; <name>;umur</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user ?id=umur</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://assets-global.website-files.com/64f9d9b4e737e7b37d4e39a4/65282071b164fea224f6afa2_actions-image.png" style="宽度：220px； height: 203px;" />;<br />;Ubicloud 是一个开放、免费、可移植的云，作为云提供商的开放替代方案。它允许用户管理自己的虚拟机和运行器，并且可以轻松与 GitHub Actions 集成. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-open-source-x64-and-arm-github-runners" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39191870" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// /hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我只是想让 Emacs 看起来漂亮 – 在终端中使用 24 位颜色</stitle>; <id>;https://chadaustin.me/ 2024/01/truecolor-terminal-emacs/</id>; <更新>;2024-01-30T14:08:44.998958Z</更新>; <link href="https://chadaustin.me/2024/01/truecolor- terminal-emacs/"/>; <author>; <name>;signa11</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=signa11</uri>; </author>; <content type="html ">;<img src="https://chadaustin.me/images/truecolor-terminal-emacs/emacs-window.png" style="宽度：220px; height: 200px;" />;<br />;感谢一些同事和 David Wilson 的 Emacs from Scratch 播放列表，我又回到了 Emacs。这个社区比我上次看到的时候更加活跃，LSP 带来了现代的完成度和内联类型检查。David 的 Emacs 看起来很漂亮 — 我也想要漂亮的颜色和字体，尤其是我喜欢的主题，例如 Solar <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#i-just-wanted-emacs-to- Look-nice-using-24-bit-color-in-terminals" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39189881" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text" >;学习通用预测器</stitle>; <id>;https://arxiv.org/abs/2401.14953</id>; <updated>;2024-01-30T21:08:44.999338Z</updated>; <link href="https: //arxiv.org/abs/2401.14953"/>; <作者>; <名称>;jandrewrogers</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jandrewrogers</uri>; </author>; <内容类型=“html”>; <img src =“https://arxiv.org/static/browse/0.3.4/images/arxiv-logo-fb.png”样式=“宽度：220px; height: 129px;" />;<br />;元学习已经成为训练神经网络从有限数据中快速学习新任务的强大方法。我们探索通过利用元将所罗门诺夫归纳法 (SI) 摊销到神经网络中的潜力-学习到极限。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#learning-universal-predictors" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39173034" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;卫星正在成为新的手机信号塔</stitle>; <id>;https://spectrum.ieee.org/satellite-cellphone-starlink</id>; <updated>;2024 -01-31T05:08:44.999709Z</更新>; <link href="https://spectrum.ieee.org/satellite-cellphone-starlink"/>; <作者>; <名称>;frasermarlow </名称>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=frasermarlow</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://spectrum.ieee.org/media-library/手机与不同大小的圆圈在不同的颜色与卫星在背景.jpg？id=51212506&width=1200&height=900" style="width: 220px;高度：166px;" />;<br />;SpaceX 运营的卫星星座 Starlink 已成功利用其最新一代卫星通过手机之间的 4G/LTE 连接发送和接收文本。这一成就体现了卫星和卫星的融合蜂窝基站，公司利用更便宜的卫星制造和发射成本来缩小手机和轨道卫星之间的差距。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#satellites-are-becoming-the-new- cellphone-towers" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39200189" target="_blank">;[评论]</a >;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;C 边界模型检查器：未得到充分利用</stitle >; <id>;https://www.philipzucker.com/cbmc_tut/</id>; <更新>;2024-01-30T19:08:45.000068Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.philipzucker. com/cbmc_tut/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;philzook</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=philzook</uri>; </author>; <content type="html ">;<img src="https://www.philipzucker.com/assets/logo.png" style="宽度：220px; height: 252px;" />;<br />;CBMC是一个自动静态验证器，可用于检查C代码的错误和bug。它易于安装和使用，可用于检查功能正确性和公共内存bug。但是，它不能很好地扩展到大型和困难的问题。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-c-bounded-model-checker-criminally-underused" target="_blank" >;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39191507" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Quickemu：快速运行优化的 Windows、macOS 和 Linux 虚拟机</stitle>; <id>;https ://github.com/quickemu-project/quickemu</id>; <更新>;2024-01-30T12:08:45.000432Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/quickemu-project/ Quickemu"/>; <author>; <name>;overbytecode</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=overbytecode</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;< img src =“https://opengraph.githubassets.com/47e7525d893c4ee614b963dfd9529c7216f1ff153fc1644ca2def6a5d5ca96f9/quickemu-project/quickemu”样式=“宽度：220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;快速创建和运行优化的 Windows、macOS 和 Linux 桌面虚拟机。 - GitHub - Quickemu-project/quickemu: 快速创建和运行优化的 Windows、macOS 和 Linux 桌面虚拟机。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#quickemu-quickly-run-optimized-windows-macos-and-linux-virtual-machines" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <id>;https://www.uscis.gov/newsroom/news-发布/uscis-announces-strengthened-integrity-measures-for-h-1b-program</id>; <更新>;2024-01-31T00:08:45.000786Z</更新>; <link href="https://www .uscis.gov/newsroom/news-releases/uscis-announces-strengthened-integrity-measures-for-h-1b-program"/>; <author>; <name>;angott</name>; <uri>;https://news .ycombinator.com/user?id=angott</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.uscis.gov/sites/default/files/images/social -media/OPA-SM_USCISonBlue_FB_1200x627_V1.png" style="宽度：220px; height: 115px;" />;<br />;USCIS 宣布了一项最终规则，以加强 H-1B 注册流程的完整性并减少欺诈。该规则包括确保选择过程公平性的措施以及推出在线申请选项H-1B 申请。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#uscis-announces-strengthened-integrity-measures-for-h-1b-program" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>;
